text: A man lost his axe and suspected his neighbor's son. He observed the way the boy walked: exactly like a thief. He observed the young man's expression: like that of a thief. He also observed his speech: like a thief. After all, all his gestures and actions denounced him guilty of the theft. But later he found his axe in a valley. And then, when he saw his neighbor's son again, all the boy's gestures and actions looked very different from those of a thief. FIN
title: La sospecha
author: nan Anónimo
